entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Ingonish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:35 a.m. ADT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Friday 31 March 2023
